property.name: insertBiologicalDataItemQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.biological_data_item ( bio_data_item_id, name, type, path, source, format, created_date, bucket_id, pretty_name, owner) VALUES ( :BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID, :NAME, :TYPE, :PATH, :SOURCE, :FORMAT, :CREATED_DATE, :BUCKET_ID, :PRETTY_NAME, :OWNER)

property.name: updateOwnerQuery
property.value: UPDATE catgenome.biological_data_item SET owner = :OWNER WHERE bio_data_item_id = :BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID

property.name: loadBiologicalDataItemsByIdsQuery
property.value:
SELECT b.bio_data_item_id, b.name, b.type, b.path, b.source, b.format, b.created_date, b.pretty_name, b.owner,
v.vcf_id, v.reference_genome_id as vcf_reference_genome_id, v.compressed as vcf_compressed, v.multi_sample as vcf_multi_sample,
g.gene_item_id, g.reference_genome_id as gene_reference_genome_id, g.compressed as gene_compressed, g.external_db_type_id as gene_external_db_type_id, g.external_db_id as gene_external_db_id, g.external_db_organism as gene_external_db_organism,
r.reference_genome_id, r.reference_genome_size, r.gene_item_id as reference_gene_item_id, rgb.name as reference_gene_item_name, rgb.bio_data_item_id as reference_gene_bio_data_item_id, rgb.type as reference_gene_type, rgb.path as reference_gene_path, rgb.format as reference_gene_format, rgb.created_date as reference_gene_created_date, rg.reference_genome_id as reference_gene_reference_genome_id, rg.compressed as reference_gene_compressed,
m.bam_id, m.reference_genome_id as bam_reference_genome_id,
bg.bed_graph_id, bg.reference_genome_id as bed_graph_reference_genome_id,
bd.bed_id, bd.reference_genome_id as bed_reference_genome_id, bd.compressed as bed_compressed,
s.seg_id, s.reference_genome_id as seg_reference_genome_id, s.compressed as seg_compressed,
maf.maf_id, maf.reference_genome_id as maf_reference_genome_id, maf.compressed as maf_compressed, maf.real_path as maf_real_path,
vg.vg_id, vg.reference_genome_id as vg_reference_genome_id, vg.real_path as vg_real_path,
h.heatmap_id, h.cell_value_type as HEATMAP_CELL_VALUE_TYPE, h.row_tree_path as HEATMAP_ROW_TREE_PATH, h.column_tree_path as HEATMAP_COLUMN_TREE_PATH, h.cell_annotation_path as HEATMAP_CELL_ANNOTATION_PATH, h.label_annotation_path as HEATMAP_LABEL_ANNOTATION_PATH,
l.lineage_tree_id, l.description, l.nodes_path, l.edges_path,
pw.pathway_id, pw.pathway_desc,
i.bio_data_item_id as index_id, i.name as index_name, i.type as index_type, i.path as index_path, i.format as index_format, i.bucket_id as index_bucket_id, i.created_date as index_created_date FROM catgenome.biological_data_item b LEFT JOIN catgenome.vcf v ON v.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.gene_item g ON g.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id
LEFT JOIN catgenome.reference_genome r ON r.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.gene_item rg ON r.gene_item_id = rg.gene_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item rgb ON rg.bio_data_item_id = rgb.bio_data_item_id
LEFT JOIN catgenome.bam m ON m.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.bed_graph bg ON bg.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.bed bd ON bd.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.seg s ON s.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.maf maf ON maf.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.vg vg ON vg.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.heatmap h ON h.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.lineage_tree l ON l.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.pathway pw ON pw.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item i ON i.bio_data_item_id = m.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = g.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = v.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = bd.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = s.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = r.index_id WHERE b.bio_data_item_id IN @in@

property.name: loadBiologicalDataItemsByNameStrictQuery
property.value:
SELECT b.bio_data_item_id, b.name, b.type, b.path, b.source, b.format, b.created_date, b.pretty_name, b.owner,
v.vcf_id, v.reference_genome_id as vcf_reference_genome_id, v.compressed as vcf_compressed, v.multi_sample as vcf_multi_sample,
g.gene_item_id, g.reference_genome_id as gene_reference_genome_id, g.compressed as gene_compressed, g.external_db_type_id as gene_external_db_type_id, g.external_db_id as gene_external_db_id, g.external_db_organism as gene_external_db_organism,
r.reference_genome_id, r.reference_genome_size, r.gene_item_id as reference_gene_item_id, rgb.name as reference_gene_item_name, rgb.bio_data_item_id as reference_gene_bio_data_item_id, rgb.type as reference_gene_type, rgb.path as reference_gene_path, rgb.format as reference_gene_format, rgb.created_date as reference_gene_created_date, rg.reference_genome_id as reference_gene_reference_genome_id, rg.compressed as reference_gene_compressed,
m.bam_id, m.reference_genome_id as bam_reference_genome_id,
bg.bed_graph_id, bg.reference_genome_id as bed_graph_reference_genome_id,
bd.bed_id, bd.reference_genome_id as bed_reference_genome_id, bd.compressed as bed_compressed,
s.seg_id, s.reference_genome_id as seg_reference_genome_id, s.compressed as seg_compressed,
maf.maf_id, maf.reference_genome_id as maf_reference_genome_id, maf.compressed as maf_compressed, maf.real_path as maf_real_path,
vg.vg_id, vg.reference_genome_id as vg_reference_genome_id, vg.real_path as vg_real_path,
h.heatmap_id, h.cell_value_type as HEATMAP_CELL_VALUE_TYPE, h.row_tree_path as HEATMAP_ROW_TREE_PATH, h.column_tree_path as HEATMAP_COLUMN_TREE_PATH, h.cell_annotation_path as HEATMAP_CELL_ANNOTATION_PATH, h.label_annotation_path as HEATMAP_LABEL_ANNOTATION_PATH,
l.lineage_tree_id, l.description, l.nodes_path, l.edges_path,
pw.pathway_id, pw.pathway_desc,
i.bio_data_item_id as index_id, i.name as index_name, i.type as index_type, i.path as index_path, i.format as index_format, i.bucket_id as index_bucket_id, i.created_date as index_created_date FROM catgenome.biological_data_item b LEFT JOIN catgenome.vcf v ON v.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.gene_item g ON g.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id
LEFT JOIN catgenome.reference_genome r ON r.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.gene_item rg ON r.gene_item_id = rg.gene_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item rgb ON rg.bio_data_item_id = rgb.bio_data_item_id
LEFT JOIN catgenome.bam m ON m.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.bed_graph bg ON bg.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.bed bd ON bd.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.seg s ON s.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.maf maf ON maf.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.vg vg ON vg.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.heatmap h ON h.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.lineage_tree l ON l.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.pathway pw ON pw.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item i ON i.bio_data_item_id = m.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = g.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = v.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = bd.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = s.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = r.index_id WHERE b.name = :NAME

property.name: loadBiologicalDataItemsByNamesStrictQuery
property.value:
SELECT b.bio_data_item_id, b.name, b.type, b.path, b.source, b.format, b.created_date, b.pretty_name, b.owner,
v.vcf_id, v.reference_genome_id as vcf_reference_genome_id, v.compressed as vcf_compressed, v.multi_sample as vcf_multi_sample,
g.gene_item_id, g.reference_genome_id as gene_reference_genome_id, g.compressed as gene_compressed, g.external_db_type_id as gene_external_db_type_id, g.external_db_id as gene_external_db_id, g.external_db_organism as gene_external_db_organism,
r.reference_genome_id, r.reference_genome_size, r.gene_item_id as reference_gene_item_id, rgb.name as reference_gene_item_name, rgb.bio_data_item_id as reference_gene_bio_data_item_id, rgb.type as reference_gene_type, rgb.path as reference_gene_path, rgb.format as reference_gene_format, rgb.created_date as reference_gene_created_date, rg.reference_genome_id as reference_gene_reference_genome_id, rg.compressed as reference_gene_compressed,
m.bam_id, m.reference_genome_id as bam_reference_genome_id,
bg.bed_graph_id, bg.reference_genome_id as bed_graph_reference_genome_id,
bd.bed_id, bd.reference_genome_id as bed_reference_genome_id, bd.compressed as bed_compressed,
s.seg_id, s.reference_genome_id as seg_reference_genome_id, s.compressed as seg_compressed,
maf.maf_id, maf.reference_genome_id as maf_reference_genome_id, maf.compressed as maf_compressed, maf.real_path as maf_real_path,
vg.vg_id, vg.reference_genome_id as vg_reference_genome_id, vg.real_path as vg_real_path,
h.heatmap_id, h.cell_value_type as HEATMAP_CELL_VALUE_TYPE, h.row_tree_path as HEATMAP_ROW_TREE_PATH, h.column_tree_path as HEATMAP_COLUMN_TREE_PATH, h.cell_annotation_path as HEATMAP_CELL_ANNOTATION_PATH, h.label_annotation_path as HEATMAP_LABEL_ANNOTATION_PATH,
l.lineage_tree_id, l.description, l.nodes_path, l.edges_path,
pw.pathway_id, pw.pathway_desc,
i.bio_data_item_id as index_id, i.name as index_name, i.type as index_type, i.path as index_path, i.format as index_format, i.bucket_id as index_bucket_id, i.created_date as index_created_date FROM catgenome.biological_data_item b LEFT JOIN catgenome.vcf v ON v.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.gene_item g ON g.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id
LEFT JOIN catgenome.reference_genome r ON r.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.gene_item rg ON r.gene_item_id = rg.gene_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item rgb ON rg.bio_data_item_id = rgb.bio_data_item_id
LEFT JOIN catgenome.bam m ON m.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.bed_graph bg ON bg.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.bed bd ON bd.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.seg s ON s.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.maf maf ON maf.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.vg vg ON vg.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.heatmap h ON h.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.lineage_tree l ON l.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.pathway pw ON pw.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item i ON i.bio_data_item_id = m.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = g.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = v.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = bd.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = s.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = r.index_id WHERE b.name IN @in@

property.name: loadBiologicalDataItemsByNameCaseInsensitiveQuery
property.value:
SELECT b.bio_data_item_id, b.name, b.type, b.path, b.source, b.format, b.created_date, b.pretty_name, b.owner,
v.vcf_id, v.reference_genome_id as vcf_reference_genome_id, v.compressed as vcf_compressed, v.multi_sample as vcf_multi_sample,
g.gene_item_id, g.reference_genome_id as gene_reference_genome_id, g.compressed as gene_compressed, g.external_db_type_id as gene_external_db_type_id, g.external_db_id as gene_external_db_id, g.external_db_organism as gene_external_db_organism,
r.reference_genome_id, r.reference_genome_size, r.gene_item_id as reference_gene_item_id, rgb.name as reference_gene_item_name, rgb.bio_data_item_id as reference_gene_bio_data_item_id, rgb.type as reference_gene_type, rgb.path as reference_gene_path, rgb.format as reference_gene_format, rgb.created_date as reference_gene_created_date, rg.reference_genome_id as reference_gene_reference_genome_id, rg.compressed as reference_gene_compressed,
m.bam_id, m.reference_genome_id as bam_reference_genome_id,
bg.bed_graph_id, bg.reference_genome_id as bed_graph_reference_genome_id,
bd.bed_id, bd.reference_genome_id as bed_reference_genome_id, bd.compressed as bed_compressed,
s.seg_id, s.reference_genome_id as seg_reference_genome_id, s.compressed as seg_compressed,
maf.maf_id, maf.reference_genome_id as maf_reference_genome_id, maf.compressed as maf_compressed, maf.real_path as maf_real_path,
vg.vg_id, vg.reference_genome_id as vg_reference_genome_id, vg.real_path as vg_real_path,
h.heatmap_id, h.cell_value_type as HEATMAP_CELL_VALUE_TYPE, h.row_tree_path as HEATMAP_ROW_TREE_PATH, h.column_tree_path as HEATMAP_COLUMN_TREE_PATH, h.cell_annotation_path as HEATMAP_CELL_ANNOTATION_PATH, h.label_annotation_path as HEATMAP_LABEL_ANNOTATION_PATH,
l.lineage_tree_id, l.description, l.nodes_path, l.edges_path,
pw.pathway_id, pw.pathway_desc,
i.bio_data_item_id as index_id, i.name as index_name, i.type as index_type, i.path as index_path, i.format as index_format, i.bucket_id as index_bucket_id, i.created_date as index_created_date FROM catgenome.biological_data_item b LEFT JOIN catgenome.vcf v ON v.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.gene_item g ON g.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id
LEFT JOIN catgenome.reference_genome r ON r.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.gene_item rg ON r.gene_item_id = rg.gene_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item rgb ON rg.bio_data_item_id = rgb.bio_data_item_id
LEFT JOIN catgenome.bam m ON m.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.bed_graph bg ON bg.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.bed bd ON bd.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.seg s ON s.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.maf maf ON maf.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.vg vg ON vg.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.heatmap h ON h.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.lineage_tree l ON l.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.pathway pw ON pw.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item i ON i.bio_data_item_id = m.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = g.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = v.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = bd.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = s.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = r.index_id WHERE LOWER(b.name) = :NAME

property.name: loadBiologicalDataItemsByNameQuery
property.value:
SELECT b.bio_data_item_id, b.name, b.type, b.path, b.source, b.format, b.created_date, b.pretty_name, b.owner,
v.vcf_id, v.reference_genome_id as vcf_reference_genome_id, v.compressed as vcf_compressed, v.multi_sample as vcf_multi_sample,
g.gene_item_id, g.reference_genome_id as gene_reference_genome_id, g.compressed as gene_compressed, g.external_db_type_id as gene_external_db_type_id, g.external_db_id as gene_external_db_id, g.external_db_organism as gene_external_db_organism,
r.reference_genome_id, r.reference_genome_size, r.gene_item_id as reference_gene_item_id, rgb.name as reference_gene_item_name, rgb.bio_data_item_id as reference_gene_bio_data_item_id, rgb.type as reference_gene_type, rgb.path as reference_gene_path, rgb.format as reference_gene_format, rgb.created_date as reference_gene_created_date, rg.reference_genome_id as reference_gene_reference_genome_id, rg.compressed as reference_gene_compressed,
m.bam_id, m.reference_genome_id as bam_reference_genome_id,
bg.bed_graph_id, bg.reference_genome_id as bed_graph_reference_genome_id,
bd.bed_id, bd.reference_genome_id as bed_reference_genome_id, bd.compressed as bed_compressed,
s.seg_id, s.reference_genome_id as seg_reference_genome_id, s.compressed as seg_compressed,
maf.maf_id, maf.reference_genome_id as maf_reference_genome_id, maf.compressed as maf_compressed, maf.real_path as maf_real_path,
vg.vg_id, vg.reference_genome_id as vg_reference_genome_id, vg.real_path as vg_real_path,
h.heatmap_id, h.cell_value_type as HEATMAP_CELL_VALUE_TYPE, h.row_tree_path as HEATMAP_ROW_TREE_PATH, h.column_tree_path as HEATMAP_COLUMN_TREE_PATH, h.cell_annotation_path as HEATMAP_CELL_ANNOTATION_PATH, h.label_annotation_path as HEATMAP_LABEL_ANNOTATION_PATH,
l.lineage_tree_id, l.description, l.nodes_path, l.edges_path,
pw.pathway_id, pw.pathway_desc,
i.bio_data_item_id as index_id, i.name as index_name, i.type as index_type, i.path as index_path, i.format as index_format, i.bucket_id as index_bucket_id, i.created_date as index_created_date FROM catgenome.biological_data_item b LEFT JOIN catgenome.vcf v ON v.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.gene_item g ON g.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id
LEFT JOIN catgenome.reference_genome r ON r.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.gene_item rg ON r.gene_item_id = rg.gene_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item rgb ON rg.bio_data_item_id = rgb.bio_data_item_id
LEFT JOIN catgenome.bam m ON m.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.bed_graph bg ON bg.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.bed bd ON bd.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.seg s ON s.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.maf maf ON maf.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.vg vg ON vg.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.heatmap h ON h.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.lineage_tree l ON l.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.pathway pw ON pw.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id LEFT JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item i ON i.bio_data_item_id = m.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = g.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = v.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = bd.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = s.index_id OR i.bio_data_item_id = r.index_id WHERE LOWER(b.name) LIKE :NAME
